A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Once Poe started his stand up routine with Hux I developed a knot in my stomach that didn't leave until the movie was over...hence this review.

Kelly Marie Tran over Ngô Thanh for lead....extremely poor decision.

Close up of "blue eyed" Captain Phasma had my kids asking "why did they have to  show the eye and why did it have to be blue like ours?"\, well kids get used to it. 
 
Disney is in it for the money\, nothing more nothing less...this movie alone will generate 20 new Halloween costumes alone...RIP SW  

(funny side note: the family wondered if i felt okay after movie\, i had to use bathroom 4 times this movie was unwatchable)
